select * from (select * from (select c.course_no, to_char(course_start_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') course_start_date, course_name, course_overview, course_stage, cc.course_student_count from course c full join (select p.course_no, count(p.payment_no) course_student_count from payment p full join student_course_state s on p.payment_no = s.payment_no where s.state=0 group by p.course_no) cc on c.course_no=cc.course_no
and course_name like '%' || #{searchWord} || '%'
and course_start_date between to_date(#{startDate},'yyyy-mm-dd') And to_date(#{endDate},'yyyy-mm-dd')
order by c.course_no desc) where rownum<= #{pageNum} * #{onePageRecord} order by course_no asc) where rownum<= #{lastPageRecords} #{onePageRecord} order by course_no desc

mapper.insert: insert into attendance(attendance_no, student_no, payment_no, attendance_date, attendance_state, attendance_reason, course_no) values(attendance_sq.nextval, #{param1}, (select payment_no from payment where student_no=#{param1} and course_no=#{param4}), sysdate, #{param2}, #{param3}, #{param4})
mapper.update: update attendance set attendance_date=sysdate, attendance_state=#{param2}, attendance_reason=#{param3} where student_no=#{param1} and payment_no=(select payment_no from payment where student_no=#{param1} and course_no=#{param4})
